critique: This document primarily deals with setting the rates of basic pay and salaries for various government employees, including those in the statutory pay systems, senior executive service, executive salaries, and uniformed services. It also addresses interim geographic adjustments. There is nothing about immigration, civil liberties, or social inclusion. It does not seem to obviously favor either states or the federal government. It does not seem to obviously favor deregulation or intervention. It does not seem to obviously favor either liberals or conservatives.
